title: Peptide and Protein ID using OpenMS tools
questions: How to convert LC-MS/MS raw files?
objectives: Protein identification from LC-MS/MS raw files.
key_points: LC-MS/MS raw files have to be converted to mzML before using GalaxyP on most GalaxyP servers.
OpenMS provides many tools for proteomic analysis and guarantees compatibility by using open file formats.
OpenMS provides several thirdparty search engines and Fido for protein inference.

workflows.name: Proteomics: Peptide and Protein ID using OpenMS
workflows.title: Proteomics: Peptide and Protein ID using OpenMS

workflows.name: Peptide And Protein ID Via OMS Using Two Search Engines
workflows.title: Peptide And Protein ID Via OMS Using Two Search Engines
